mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MJOINDATE) AS DAY1MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY2MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY3MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY4MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY5MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY6MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY7MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY8MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY9MNUMSUM, COUNT(MJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-8,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY10MNUMSUM FROM MEMBER

SELECT COUNT(CJOINDATE) AS DAY1CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY2CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY3CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY4CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY5CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY6CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY7CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY8CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY9CNUMSUM, COUNT(CJOINDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-8,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY10CNUMSUM FROM CMEMBER

SELECT COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE) AS DAY1SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY2SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY3SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY4SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY5SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY6SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY7SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY8SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY9SNUM, COUNT(SCONFIRMDATE)-COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SCONFIRMDATE, 'YYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-8,'YYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY10SNUM FROM STORE
SELECT COUNT(MJOINDATE) FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(CJOINDATE) FROM CMEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(CQNAKEY) FROM QNAC WHERE CQNAKEY=0
SELECT COUNT(MQNAKEY) FROM QNAM WHERE MQNAKEY=0
SELECT COUNT(SSTATUS) FROM STORE WHERE SSTATUS=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMEMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE TO_CHAR(BDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY1MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY2MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY3MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY4MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY5MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY6MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY7MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY8MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-8,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY9MNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(MJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-9,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY10MNUM FROM MEMBER

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY1CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY2CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY3CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY4CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY5CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY6CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY7CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY8CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-8,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY9CNUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CJOINDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-9,'YYMMDD') THEN 1 END ) AS DAY10CNUM FROM CMEMBER

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MCODE=#{mCode}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS E, H.* FROM (SELECT MCODE, MID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK.BMCODE=MEMBER.MCODE)MBOOKNUM , MNAME, MEMAIL, MKEY FROM MEMBER WHERE (MCODE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR MID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR MNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR MEMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY MKEY ASC) H) WHERE E BETWEEN #{paging.startRow} AND #{paging.endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS E, H.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CMEMBER WHERE (CCODE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CEMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY CKEY ASC) H) WHERE E BETWEEN #{paging.startRow} AND #{paging.endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS E, H.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CMEMBER WHERE CEMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY CKEY ASC) H) WHERE E BETWEEN #{paging.startRow} AND #{paging.endRow}

mapper.update: UPDATE STORE SET SFOOD= #{sFood}, STIME= #{sTime}, SURL= #{sUrl}, SADDR=#{sAddr}, SNAME= #{sName}, SPHONE= #{sPhone}, SSEAT= #{sSeat}, SCONTENTS= #{sContents}, SBNUM= #{sbNum}, SPARK= #{sPark}, SKEYWORD= #{sKeyword}, SFILENAME1 = #{sFileName1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFILENAME2 = #{sFileName2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFILENAME3 = #{sFileName3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE STORECODE=#{storeCode}
